intro: Cyclophorus lancifolius, commonly known as the lanceleaf cyclophorus, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Gesneriaceae. It is characterized by its lance-shaped leaves and clusters of showy, tubular flowers that are typically pink or red in color. Native to tropical regions of Africa, this plant thrives in moist, shaded environments. It is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its attractive foliage and vibrant blooms. The species is also valued for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal practices.
